parameter.name: [localHostRTP]
parameter.description: local address of the MTS host

parameter.name: [localPortRTP]
parameter.description: local port of the MTS host

parameter.name: [localClient]
parameter.description: flag to activate the client scenario

parameter.name: [remoteHostRTP]
parameter.description: remote address of the SUT host

parameter.name: [remotePortRTP]
parameter.description: remote port of the SUT host

scenario.sendMessageSIP:
INVITE sip:[inviteeName1]@[100_DOMAIN_ADDR]:[remotePortSIP] SIP/2.0 To: <sip:[inviteeName1]@[100_DOMAIN_ADDR]:[remotePortSIP]> From: "[clientName]" <sip:[clientName]@[100_DOMAIN_ADDR]:[localPortSIP]>;tag=[localTag] Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [localHostSIP]:[localPortSIP];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId] Call-ID: [newCallId] CSeq: [newCseqNumber] INVITE Max-Forwards: 70 Proxy-Authorization: IMS_GPRS_SCHEMA token="999" Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, REFER, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PUBLISH Contact: <sip:[clientName]@[localSIP]> Supported: timer Session-Expires: 3600;refresher=uac Content-Length: x Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=[clientName] 999 999 IN IP4 [localHostSIP] s=- c=IN IP4 [localHostSIP] t=0 0 m=audio [localPortRTP] RTP/AVP 8 101 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=sendrecv a=+g.poc.talkburst a=maxptime:200 a=ptime:200 m=application 25463 udp TBCP a=fmtp:TBCP queuing=0;tb_priority=1;timestamp=0

ACK [Request-URI] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [lastCseqNumber] ACK Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [localSIP];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId] Contact: <sip:[clientName]@[localSIP]> Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: PoC-client/OMA1.0 XmlLoader/v0.0 Proxy-Authorization: IMS_GPRS_SCHEMA token="999" Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, NOTIFY Content-Length: 0

BYE [Request-URI] SIP/2.0 To: [To] From: [From] Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: [newCseqNumber] BYE Contact: <sip:[clientName]@[localSIP]> Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [localSIP];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId] Proxy-Authorization: IMS_GPRS_SCHEMA token="999" User-Agent: PoC-client/OMA1.0 XmlLoader/v0.0 Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
